bioconda.name: bioconductor-matter
bioconda.summary: Out-of-core statistical computing and signal processing

biotools.summary: Memory-efficient reading, writing, and manipulation of structured binary data on disk as vectors, matrices, and arrays. This package is designed to be used as a back-end for Cardinal for working with high-resolution mass spectrometry imaging data.

bioschemas.name: matter
bioschemas.summary: Memory-efficient reading, writing, and manipulation of structured binary data on disk as vectors, matrices, and arrays. This package is designed to be used as a back-end for Cardinal for working with high-resolution mass spectrometry imaging data.
